1.content: Celty is a Japaness women with no head and her crazy boyfriend of a doctor made her helment her new head so so can talk and eat without her phone and see has been called in from shinra her boyfriend to try a new growth formula to scare the police from chasing her and give her transporting her self from one spot to the next. The formula was doing it's best then it kicked in with her clothes growing with her till she broke the ceiling in sucsese. She was at least 110ft tall and she liked it. Shooter/bike drove up her leg and celty grabbed her bike with eace but not wanting to crush it with boyfriend on it. Shinra was scared of hights but if celty was a giantess, he might make a acception eventhough he wanted off. " hey shinra can you make my bike big so I have something to ride?" she ask nicely. Shinra froze in her hand shaking and celty plucked him off the bike and into her other hand and said it might be possible to. She knew that he could trust him and set both the bike and him on the ground so they could work. All and all celty enjoyed herself by meeting mikado by the russin sushi eventhought everyone move out of her way. See tap Simon on the back with her knuck and asked if mikado was inside" he be inside, one sec please?" celty smiled wilel she tilled her head a little then came out mikado and simon. Scared Simon ran inside and closed the shop early. When the closed sign in Japaness came on celty grabbed mikado and stood tall while smiling and bolted to the docks. Unknown to her she was being fallow by a black rider with thin red lineing. The bike is from America and it was her target but she didn't care at all. She was having fun with mikado in her hand and laughing with joy she felt great. That was until the black rider showed with cat-like helmet but with a train # 4449. The rider the some how was Celtys size in 2 second and then his bike Changed size he then shoved her out of the way when a heat seeking missle came out of no ware but struck the rider in the head and the helmet fell off. Celty then remembered why she was hired. Her target was a giant in disguise. As the helmet rolled away the teen looked at her and she looked at him. "Shit" grabbing his helmet and cutting off her leg stance he took off to the country side to hide. " What the hell is his problem" said mikado. Just then Celty then remembered that this was her target but without her own bike she ran to the city to find the rider but that was harder than easy. Jest then she herd her bike whin" shooter is that you?" said Celty " look at who can change size, shooter show her please?" after that shooter was rideable to Celtys size. She yelled. "Danm shooter you look great!" jumping on with mikado in her pocket as a wind breaker so he didn't fall out she rode around town and stopped at a inter section to search but couldn't see him any where until he felw passed her and the chase cotinued till they reached America through Russia and Canada. Then the reached Ohio but just as celty was vining grab him he telaported away. Celty came to stop in new philadelphia Ohio and lost the teen
1.title: Time Travel giantess

14.content: Mikado poped out and cralwed up her right arm " Danm he's gone like take and mo......" before mikado could finish another giant rolled up to celty. "You looking for my boyfriend " Chaz Huprich" is that right?" the other giantess asked. "Yea I wanted to talk to him but he shoved me away from a missel and his helmet fell of. I wanted to thank him but he said shit kicked me down and took off here. Do you know where he is? By the way what's you name?" "Ashley jones. Why" " just so I could remember you for later. That's all" " If you want Chaz you'll have to come with me to his house." Celty agreed they had to find Chaz and fast. "He doesn't stay in one spot for long so we better hurry and tell that horse of a bike to calm down he's driving up a fucking road!" celty didn't say anything as the giants rode to the hill side. Their they saw Chaz in a train form as the southern pacific/ nazi uniform. Chaz's eyes werent like anything that celty hasn't seen before they rode up the hill side to Chazs spot they saw the bike but no Chaz. Then they saw a hand over the hill side higher then were they were standing. Chaz had fallen asleep and it would take a nucke to wake him up. "Chaz, celty said to me to tell you....." bstore Ashley could finish Chaz woke and didn't want to her anything except the wind against his funnel. Celty slapped him over and over again and again but wouldn't wake up. Chaz was a heavy sleeper and wouldn't buge. Soon Chaz woke up and left them in confusion and toke off for the woods. Celty, Mikado and Ashley stood their in silence. Chaz soon reapered in sight and drove away to the highway in his nomual size. On the way to the school since Chaz and Ashley graduated 1 year ago, Seth and Ian came out to go to school and notied Chaz and went over to talk to him. Chaz's mom wasn't happy with him so Chaz pulled out his desert eagle hand gun and aimed at him mom if she came over and caused Chaz problems. He didn't have time to talk he put his gun away and took of to his job in drug buster program. 14.title: Danm it round 2

141.content: Before they caught up with Chaz he sped off will changing size. Celty was beyond nevus and didn't know what to do now. she and Ashley shrunk down to normal size but Celty was bigger the Ashley And Chaz's Mom. " So Now What?" Before Ashley could answer, A Russian , German, japaness and american group of 4 walk around but the German was easy to identify as Dr Maxis helper Dr Edward Richtofen " O joy more people How Vundfa" Saying it as a joke. 141.title: Zombie Killers And a Giant Nazi

1411.content:
Celty, Seth & Ian saw Chaz on old steel hill road and wanted to stop him but Ashley took out her brand new motorcycle and took off for Chaz leaving the other confused. Then see herd a voice and saw the nazi looking for Chaz to" let me try my German ascent that might help, Vondafa, hiel huprivh, vendrva, vell?" then out of noware they herd a low growl " go away you German hitler bastered." "Chaz what's the matter?" "Ashley being giant is like a curse you can't get ride of it both of us a bound together until we die but I don't see that happing anytime any soon. So back off and leave ME ALONE!!!!!!!" not wanting to push any ones luck she let Chaz go into the deep part that only he knew about. Ashley sigh and to take Seth and Ian home for the night but Seth and Ian escaped to go sleep with Chaz. " suicidal is what their are" mummed Chaz " why can't they just leave me alone" he keeped saying to him self as he change to nazi/daylight to sleep in but he's eyes pick up other foot steps. He stop and armed his guns for an ambuse. Just as Chaz turned around Seth and Ian screamed as his gun were drawn from their hoslter and they looked at each other. "Danm it guys I thought you were somebody else, go home." " to late now Chaz besides me and Seth wants to stay with you for a night please?" " get on you spend one night with me and that's it. Understand Ian, Seth & and Ashley I know your hiding behind the tree so just come out" " Danm it is it the easy to see me." "Only train with heat seakers, come Seth and Ian have school in the morning so thell stay with me alright ashley."
1411.title: Look for him

14111.content:
Chaz fell asleep after making sure Seth and Ian were asleep but they fell asleep Chaz chest and they thought it was hard as steel but was soft like his chest. "Weird Ian metal shouldn't feel like skin right?" " he's part nazi and steam train so it could change right" " I guess so let's ask Ashley." they walked of Chaz and found Ashley reading book or something. Seth spoke up but not to load to wake up Chaz but he had his iPod with him fully charged so they got her attenion. "Ashley when Chaz changes forms does he get hard or soft when he sleeps?" " why ask now, what's the matter?" picking them up and while lying down on her back she placed them by he cans infront so they don't fall off. Before they could answer Chaz walked up with top lights on full blast to see Seth and Ian on Ashley. Before anyone said any thing Chaz smiled and walked back to his camp site. "weird is that what you guys ment." Ashley stood up with Seth and Ian in her hand just as celty woke up from Seth passing her ealier. "What's going on guys, were the fire?" celty said as she tried to wake up as best as she can. Ashley spoke up. "Weres mikado?" "Iin my helmet sleeping why." opening up her visiors to see mikado sleeping in mid space. "WOW" all 3 said at the same time. Beside Celty, Chaz knew about mid space in heads before his nuclear accident that changed Chaz & ashley's life forever. "So know what?" said Ian. Celty had an idea " Ian, shut up and sleep you and Seth have school tomorrow and your mother would kill you if you fell asleep in class so you'll stay with me wi'll Seth stays with Ashley understand!" Celty swipped Ian from Ashley and fell asleep again but held Ian down with both hands. Ian set his iPod to go off at 4 am so they had time to get ready for school.

4 came faster than ecpeted and Celty had her phone set for 4 too. She sleeped up by a rock wall and head way tilled side ways. Ian woke up because Celty was drooling all night and his iPod his life savor. Celty felt Ian waking up on her chest and so she set him down so she could get Seth up. Seth was up and ready to go but celty couldn't see very well when she walked right passed him and passed out waking up Ashley but Chaz was gone around 2. Out of no ware Chaz came thundering down through the sky with 50 passenger cars. "Danm, I thought that Chaz scrapped those years ago?" said Ashley "What are they?" said celty "Batering passenger, me and Chaz fought in the great iron war 1 1/2 ago and Chaz must have hid the cars away for some reason." cab pov-"Nate you ready for take off" " all clear Chaz were ready" "Ten-four were fling." breaks release, steam hissing hard and pistons pumping and the engine took off for the day to Pearl harbor. Swapping his outfit from Nazi/Daylight to ghost rider. This is the same outfit the Chaz was in when the nuclear meltdown in tokoy Japan happened last year. Wearing 49 on both arms representing the fallen U.S.S Arizona, in all black as when Chaz saw Celty for the first time."<Chaz it Nate were ready are you ok bud>?" "Wa yeah I'm ok ready for departure Nate." But Chaz wasn't sure should he let Ashley pull the train well it to late the station master blew the whistle and Chaz resopnded by blowing his own whistle as he moved out. "Danm what's wrong with me and the hawaii train?" said quietly to him self but Nate him and now he was worered.
14111.title: Peaceful night

141111.content:
Noon, guns, ships, trains everywhere."California sure is running a lot of stuff right Chaz? Chaz?" Nate tried to get his attention but chaz was shaking through California. they soon reached Pearl Harbor & chaz let out a long whistle to let them know the stopped at Hawaii.

When chaz decoupled from the train 2 Hawaiian Marines guided chaz to a round house that they built for him to stay at with the New Philadelphia high school marching band. chaz put his train away and walked over to the U.S.S. Arizona Battleship. unknown to the high schoolers chaz had power to raise the dead from any ground. all he has to do is throw a Nazi symbol at the ship and it will become indestructible any ship that is at pearl harbor including The USS Belknap, USS Huprich (same as Arizona), & USS Indianapolis.Throwing one into the gun turret, the Arizona started to rebuild it self in 5 minutes, Belknap Came out of nowhere and chaz Changed his size again and Nate ran up to see the Arizona standing in front of them and was the first ship to walk and talk. But Chaz was a steamer and an ass kicker so he can take down arizona if nessisary. "Wha... What happened, i saw a missile no two missiles eh am i dead?" screamed arizona."Ah Nope" Said Chaz while putting Nate on his Shoulder." you got luck that they didn't scrap you completely otherwise you wouldn't be eh standing on you eh oh feet." finished Nate
